content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake41d0bhm.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/csv/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

/*
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://datalake41d0bhm.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/parquet/**',
FORMAT='parquet'
) AS result
*/

USE sales;
GO;
SELECT Item as Product,
     SUM(Quantity) AS ItemsSold,
     ROUND(SUM(UnitPrice) - SUM(TaxAmount), 2) AS NetRevenue
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'sales/csv/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE= 'sales_data',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS orders
GROUP BY Item

SELECT YEAR(OrderDate) AS OrderYear,
       COUNT(*) AS OrderedItems
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://datalake41d0bhm.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales/parquet/year=*/',
    FORMAT='parquet'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) IN ('2019',' 2020')
GROUP BY YEAR(OrderDate)
ORDER BY OrderYear

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS(
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
    )
);
GO;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.orders
(
    alesOrderNumber VARCHAR(10),
    SalesOrderLineNumber INT,
    OrderDate DATE,
    CustomerName VARCHAR(25),
    EmailAddress VARCHAR(50),
    Item VARCHAR(30),
    Quantity INT,
    UnitPrice DECIMAL(18,2),
    TaxAmount DECIMAL (18,2)
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE =sales_data,
    LOCATION = 'csv/*.csv',
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
);
GO;

NewEntity.Name: PoChangeOrder
NewEntity.Description:
A specific change or modification to a PO after the initial PO has been issued or processed.

This might be due to new requirements or in response to contractual issues that have come into play.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order Change Order.

Columns.Name: PoNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order.

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderPlacedDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Change Order was placed.

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderEffectiveDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Change Order is effective.

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderReasonDescription
Columns.Description: The reason for the Change Order.

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderAuthorizedByName
Columns.Description: The name of the person authorizing the Change Order.

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderServicesProcurementSpecification
Columns.Description: A specification or description of the specifications or details regarding PO change order.

Columns.Name: Note
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional detail regarding the PO Change Order.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderStatusTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the PO Change Order Status.

Columns.Name: VendorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Vendor.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: DocumentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Document.

Properties.Description:
A specific change or modification to a PO after the initial PO has been issued or processed.

This might be due to new requirements or in response to contractual issues that have come into play.

NewEntity.Name: PoChangeOrderItem
NewEntity.Description:
The specific Item(s) that are affected by the PO Change Order.

These should be compared to the Items specified by the original PO.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order Change Order.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderLineItemNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Change Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: Quantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of Items affected by the Change Order Item.

Columns.Name: QualityStandardMeasure
Columns.Description:
The specific Quality Standard metric assigned to the RFI/RFP/PO etc.

Example:

Quality Standard = PPM (Parts Per Million defective)
Quality Standard Measure = 100 (100 parts may be defective per million parts)

Columns.Name: ChangeOrderReason
Columns.Description: The reason for the associated Item change order.

Columns.Name: QualityStandardId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Quality Standard.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

NewEntity.Name: PoChangeOrderRelatedParty
NewEntity.Description:
The party(s) have a relationship or responsibility with the Purchase Order  Change Order during the associated period.

Ex:
- PO Notify Party
- Responsible Employee
- Buy Team Member

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order Change Order.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: PurchasingPartyRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchasing Party Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the party relationship is in place.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the party relationship is in place.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderPartyRelationshipNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the PO Change Order - Party relationship.

NewEntity.Name: PoChangeOrderStatus
NewEntity.Description: The status of the associated PO Change Order.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order Change Order.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderStatusStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The start timestamp of the PO change order status.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderStatusEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The end timestamp of the PO change order status.

Columns.Name: PoChangeOrderStatusTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the PO Change Order Status.
